BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO EST_NOTICE_ISSUE_DTL (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE, NUM_NOTICE_ID, STR_NOTICE_NO, DT_NOTICE_DATE,STR_CONTENT, DT_LAST_DATE, STR_TIME, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE EST_NOTICE_ISSUE_DTL SET STR_NOTICE_NO=?, DT_NOTICE_DATE=?, STR_CONTENT=?, DT_LAST_DATE=?, STR_TIME=?, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND NUM_NOTICE_ID=?
UPDATE EST_NOTICE_ISSUE_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? AND NUM_NOTICE_ID=?
